title: Pipes Closed
body:
#### System information

Geth version: 1.4.11
OS & Version: Windows 10
Commit hash : 18Mh

Hello there Mining friends , got this message at the end , first three days no more progress in my geth rpc , however mining going good , and then The pipes are closed ... Does anyone know what this means and what i should do  and above that Mining Ops is still going on ....Below is what my rpc is saying to me ... Specially the end is interesting .... It is in Dutch , but means that the pipes are closing ...
And should i just close geth and start anew one ...
Thank you all and May the mining be Strong !

I0825 15:19:14.185155 core/blockchain.go:963] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 110 txs in 129.0075ms. #2137206 [e4f1492a / e4f1492a]
I0825 15:19:14.493172 miner/worker.go:573] commit new work on block 2137207 with 47 txs & 0 uncles. Took 306.0181ms
I0825 15:19:39.488604 core/blockchain.go:963] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 43 txs in 45.0032ms. #2137207 [d8d49707 / d8d49707]
I0825 15:19:39.912628 miner/worker.go:573] commit new work on block 2137208 with 181 txs & 0 uncles. Took 421.0239ms
I0825 15:19:50.665243 core/blockchain.go:963] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 177 txs in 237.0138ms. #2137208 [6362cdf7 / 6362cdf7]
I0825 15:19:50.802251 miner/worker.go:573] commit new work on block 2137209 with 83 txs & 0 uncles. Took 134.0069ms
I0825 15:19:53.365398 core/blockchain.go:963] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 83 txs in 94.0055ms. #2137209 [74315504 / 74315504]
I0825 15:19:53.475404 miner/worker.go:573] commit new work on block 2137210 with 18 txs & 0 uncles. Took 107.0056ms
I0825 15:20:24.323171 core/blockchain.go:963] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 1 txs in 15.9994ms. #2137210 [5b7265cd / 5b7265cd]
I0825 15:20:24.872203 miner/worker.go:573] commit new work on block 2137211 with 213 txs & 0 uncles. Took 547.0315ms
I0828 20:16:04.778699 rpc/server.go:376] De pipes wordt gesloten.
I0828 20:16:04.781700 rpc/server.go:376] De pipes wordt gesloten.
ok I did and dont know what i am looking at , or how this answers my question , sorry bout that ... please specify the link ... Thanks any how for the answer !!!
I meant that the GitHub user @bas-vk (who is a go-ethereum member) should please look at this issue.
Do you still get blocks, if so you are probably fine, if not, check your peer count.  If your peers are 0, something is closing your tcp sockets, like a router or firewall.

Dear Sam , thanks for the reply , not sure about the blocks , cause hashing with 20Mh s , but peers are 0 , so started the geth again !hope i am doing everything right though , get a lot of peer time-outs though , dropping due dao fork or so …

Van: Sam Lavery [mailto:notifications@github.com] 
Verzonden: vrijdag 9 september 2016 1:33
Aan: ethereum/go-ethereum go-ethereum@noreply.github.com
CC: RobbieRich defamilieschoemaker@gmail.com; Author author@noreply.github.com
Onderwerp: Re: [ethereum/go-ethereum] Pipes Closed (#2957)

Do you still get blocks, if so you are probably fine, if not, check your peer count. If your peers are 0, something is closing your tcp sockets, like a router or firewall.

—
You are receiving this because you authored the thread.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/issues/2957#issuecomment-245774506 , or mute the thread https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ATbHcYWHSNWtSxjiOR5wV6shwacmJRDAks5qoJsbgaJpZM4JvJiK .  https://github.com/notifications/beacon/ATbHcfn_8NekQt-qyu4540Ew4nA6DPinks5qoJsbgaJpZM4JvJiK.gif

A search on the internet on `De pipes wordt gesloten.` seems to suggest that the client has closed the connection as you mentioned. In this case geth tried to write a RPC response back to the client but fails with this error.

One thing that looks odd is the long time gap of almost 5 hours between the error and the last moment everything seems to work fine (or perhaps these are the 3 days). Did you remove some logs? Did geth responded when you attach the console to it?

Also, please check you geth version. Geth 1.4.11 prints the first log at a different line number.

Dear Bas , thought it was odd indeed and have not removed any logs , that i know off ! not sure what you mean by attaching geth tot he console ?

When i start up get hit always starts up correct i think , no errors of any kind …

Greetings Robbie

Onderwerp: Re: [ethereum/go-ethereum] Pipes Closed (#2957)

A search on the internet on De pipes wordt gesloten. seems to suggest that the client has closed the connection as you mentioned. In this case geth tried to write a RPC response back to the client but fails with this error.

One thing that looks odd is the long time gap of almost 5 hours between the error and the last moment everything seems to work fine (or perhaps these are the 3 days). Did you remove some logs? Did geth responded when you attach the console to it?

Also, please check you geth version. Geth 1.4.11 prints the first log at a different line number.

Onderwerp: Re: [ethereum/go-ethereum] Pipes Closed (#2957)

A search on the internet on De pipes wordt gesloten. seems to suggest that the client has closed the connection as you mentioned. In this case geth tried to write a RPC response back to the client but fails with this error.

One thing that looks odd is the long time gap of almost 5 hours between the error and the last moment everything seems to work fine (or perhaps these are the 3 days). Did you remove some logs? Did geth responded when you attach the console to it?

Also, please check you geth version. Geth 1.4.11 prints the first log at a different line number.

` it looks like you have connectivity and it's working.  You may be on the wrong fork tho...

Thanks for your reaction ! And thought i was on the support dao fork … why do you think i am on the wrong one ? Anyway super thanks again ! Robbie
